description: Light, well-ventilated and packable trekking trousers for warm climates, all over the world. A prize-winning model in G-1000 Air Stretch (organic cotton, partly recycled polyester) and pliant stretch fabric, also made from partly recycled polyester. Both fabrics are quick drying with good air circulation and zippers in the sides that release excess heat. Perfect for trekking and travelling when you need long trousers for protection against the sun, rough terrain or insects.
name: Fjallraven Abisko Midsummer Trousers, Reg - Mens
